name: Galactic Routes 0.0
description:
A homework about procedural map generation.  Star routes are based according to a minimal expansion graph using Kruskal's algorithm.

Controls:

     Click on System: System Info

     Double click on System (On Locked Camera): Fix Camera to system as pivot.

     Right click on neighbor System: Go to system

     Click on spaceship icon: Point camera to ship and follow

     Esc:  Menu

Camera controls:

ON LOCKED CAMERA:

     -    Hold Scrol Button + Mouse movement: Rotate camera around current pivot

ON FREE CAMERA

     -    Hold Scrol Button + Mouse movement: Translate camera aorund world

     -    Hold right click + Mouse movement: Rotate camera around stelar cluster
